Simple example

```vue
<template>
    <div class="pos-rel pad-l5 text-center">
        <ui-select
            class="pos-abs pos-top-left"
            v-model="position"
            v-bind="{ options, size: 'small' }"
        ></ui-select>
        <ui-tooltip :position="position">
            <template #target="{ events, binds }">
                <button class="btn btn-success w-33 pad-v-l1" v-on="events" v-bind="binds">
                    hover me
                </button>
            </template>
            <div>Title</div>
            <div>
                I'm on the <code>{{ position }}</code> side
            </div>
        </ui-tooltip>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import UiSelect from './Select.vue';
import UiTooltip from './Tooltip.vue';
export default {
    components: { UiSelect, UiTooltip },
    data() {
        return {
            position: 'top',
            options: [
                'left',
                'left-start',
                'left-end',
                'top',
                'top-start',
                'top-end',
                'bottom',
                'bottom-start',
                'bottom-end',
                'right',
                'right-start',
                'right-end',
            ],
        };
    },
};
</script>
```

Advanced example. Using the trigger on 'click' and custom tooltip styling

```vue
<template>
    <div class="pos-rel pad-l5 text-center">
        <ui-tooltip position="top" trigger-on="click" :positionOffset="[10, 10]">
            <template #target="{ events, binds }">
                <button class="btn btn-success w-33 pad-v-l1" v-on="events" v-bind="binds">
                    click me
                </button>
            </template>
            <template #tooltip>
                <div class="panel">
                    <div class="panel-body">
                        <p>Remove the hover from me so that I disappear</p>
                        <p>or just click somewhere outside.</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </template>
        </ui-tooltip>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import UiTooltip from './Tooltip.vue';
export default {
    components: { UiTooltip }
};
</script>
```
